alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 4:01PM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow, moderate at times. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Central Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
